fields.content: Founded in 2005 by artist and entrepreneur Juliette Pelletier, Reflect-arts is dedicated to creating events to give artists opportunities to exhibit, showcase performers, and develop audiences in unique venues Internationally. Reflect-arts is based in New York city, but works with like-minded people around the world.

Reflect-arts curates exhibitions in New York, Boston and Switzerland in collaboration with venues, both traditional and alternative. The events showcase diverse groupings of visual artists in tangent with contemporary performance artists. To date, attendance at Reflect-arts exhibitions and events number in the thousands.

Reflect-arts represents a number of individual artists. The individual representation is selected by a panel of our peers, and their work is featured in these online galleries, as well immediate entry into selected group exhibitions. The individual artists are from across the globe and represent a diverse esthetic.

Reflect-arts services are geared towards marketing for both artists and venues. Reflect-arts ever-growing mailing list is comprised of 3000+ artists, galleries, dealers, curators, collectors and press worldwide. By targeted marketing, Reflect-arts has provided artists and venues with international exposure, new opportunities and press.

Reflect-arts sends a monthly newsletter. By adding yourself to the mailing list, you can be apprised of events, opportunities and featured artists and affiliates. If you are an artists we also encourage you send your website for consideration as the monthly ‘featured artist’.
